AUTO_LOAN_LATE_WITHOUT_AMOUNT.violation: Auto loan late but missing Past Due amount

CHARGEOFF_PASTDUE_PRESENT.violation: Charge-off account should not report Past Due

CHARGEOFF_WITH_BALANCE.violation: Charge-off account still reporting changing balance

CIVIL_JUDGMENT_NO_ADDRESS_MATCH.violation: Civil judgment without full PII match

CLOSED_ACCOUNT_NEW_LATE.violation: Closed account shows new late marks post-closure

CLOSE_DATE_MISSING_ON_CLOSED.violation: Account status closed but Date Closed missing

CODE_EXPIRED_NO_RESOLUTION.violation: XB code older than 90 days without update

CODE_PRESENT_NO_REMARK.violation: XB code but no dispute remark

COLL_DUPLICATE_AGENCY_LISTINGS.violation: Two agencies reporting same debt concurrently

COLL_INVALID_JURISDICTION.violation: Collector lacks license for reported state

COLL_PORTFOLIO_TRANSFER_BAL_CHANGE.violation: Balance jumps at transfer without reason

CROSS_BUREAU_BALANCE_CONFLICT.violation: Cross-bureau balance conflict for same account

CROSS_BUREAU_LIMIT_CONFLICT.violation: Cross-bureau limit conflict for same account

CROSS_BUREAU_PAYMENT_HISTORY_CONFLICT.violation: Cross-bureau payment_history conflict for same account

CROSS_BUREAU_STATUS_CONFLICT.violation: Cross-bureau status conflict for same account

CROSS_BUREAU_STATUS_MISMATCH.violation: Different status across bureaus for same account

DEBT_BUYER_NO_PURCHASE_DATE.violation: Debt buyer tradeline missing purchase/assignment date

DISPUTE_REMARK_NO_CODE.violation: Consumer dispute remark but no XB/XF code

DOFD_MOVED_FORWARD.violation: Re-aged: DOFD advanced to later date

ECOA_MISMATCH.violation: ECOA Code inconsistent with co-borrower data

HARD_INQUIRY_AFTER_FREEZE.violation: Hard inquiry after security freeze in place

HARD_INQUIRY_ON_ACCOUNT_TYPE.violation: Hard inquiry not matching account type opened

INCONSISTENT_DOFD_HISTORY.violation: DOFD not aligned with first 90-day late in history

INQUIRY_DURING_FREEZE_NO_PIN.violation: Hard inquiry during freeze without PIN usage

INQUIRY_TYPE_MISMATCH_NO_ACCOUNT.violation: Hard inquiry no corresponding account within 90 days

LASTPAY_AFTER_CLOSE.violation: Last Payment Date after Close Date

LAST_ACTIVITY_AFTER_CLOSE.violation: Date of Last Activity after account closed

LATE120_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 120-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE150_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 150-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE180_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 180-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE30_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 30-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE60_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 60-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE90_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Payment history shows 90-day late but Past Due = 0

LATE_STATUS_NO_PASTDUE.violation: Late marks with zero Past Due

LIMIT_MISSING_ON_REVOLVING.violation: Missing credit limit on revolving account

MISSING_DATE_REPORTED.violation: Date Reported missing on derogatory item

MISSING_DOFD.violation: Missing or invalid Date of First Delinquency

MISSING_PAYMENT_HISTORY.violation: Delinquency status but Payment History blank

ORIG_CHARGEOFF_MISSING_SOURCE.violation: Charge-off with no original creditor/issuer listed

PASTDUE_ON_INSTALLMENT_PAID.violation: Installment paid as agreed but Past Due > 0

PASTDUE_WITH_ZERO_BALANCE.violation: Past Due exists while balance is zero

PUBLIC_RECORD_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.violation: Public record address does not match consumer PII

REAGING_WITHOUT_PAYMENT.violation: DOFD moved forward absent qualifying payment/activity

REMARK_ACCOUNT_IN_DISPUTE_BUT_NO_INVESTI.violation: Dispute remark with no investigation start

REMARK_ACTIVE_DURING_FREEZE.violation: Activity remark while security freeze active

REMARK_BANKRUPTCY_NO_PUBLIC_RECORD.violation: Bankruptcy remark but no public record

REMARK_CONSUMER_DENIES_CONFLICT_PAYS_AS_.violation: Remark 'consumer_denies' conflicts with status 'Pays as agreed'

REMARK_DISPUTE_OUTCOME_MISSING.violation: Dispute closed but no outcome remark

REMARK_FRAUD_NO_BLOCK.violation: Fraud/ID theft remark but no §605B block

REPORTED_AFTER_DISPUTE_DEADLINE.violation: No update within 30 days of dispute

SETTLED_STILL_LATE.violation: Settled/paid account showing new late marks

STUCK_DATE_REPORTED.violation: Date Reported stale > 180 days on active trade

TAX_LIEN_REPORTED_POST_2018.violation: Tax lien still reported post-2018 purge

ZERO_BAL_WITH_PAYMENT_DUE.violation: Zero Balance but scheduled payment present
